title: Katarina the Dragonslayer and the Foebreaker's Curse
description: A half-elven slave girl discovers that she is the first in centuries to have been born with the magical gifting of the Pelethites, an order of consecrated warriors who once defended the elven lands. A confluence of events places her in the heart of a crisis when her frantic escape from a vengeful mob forces her onto the King's Road, which is said to have been cursed because of the Foebreakers, living machines of war which devastated the Southlands long ago.
author: Samuel  Medina
